typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	windowStartTime as date,
	windowEndTime as date
}
source(output(
		StoreAltID as string,
		StoreName as string,
		StoreLocation as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> StoreFile
StoreFile filter(left(StoreAltID,3)=='LOC') ~> FilterByStoreAltID
FilterByStoreAltID derive(CreatedBy = 'Andy Peng',
		triggerWindowStartTime = $windowStartTime,
		triggerWindowEndTime = $windowEndTime) ~> DerivedColumnCreatedBy
DerivedColumnCreatedBy alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsertIf
AlterRowUpsertIf sink(input(
		StoreAltID as string,
		StoreName as string,
		StoreLocation as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		CreatedBy as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedBy as string,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['StoreAltID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OutStgStores
